title: If Neuralink were to be everything that Elon Musk promises, would it be more of a benefit or danger to humanity? - Quora

response.answer_text: You would litrally have to be out of your mind to let Elon hook you up to his computer. Today you can't stop people from hscking into your computer. How the hell do think you. the personal you, are going to keep the hackers out of your head.If you want to get a look at that future, watch a few of the zombie movies that are on tv all day. That idea has to be the most dangerous idea ever proposed by anyone ever. Go back and watch the star trek movies where Patrick between a Borg. Not for me.
